name: Forest Mystery
description:
Explore the exciting world of Forest Mystery. Go on an exploration spree and walk through the unique levels littered with fun and mind boggling quests and puzzles. On your adventure you will meet different NPC's who will help you
to progress. .



Forest Mystery is a new take to the walking simulator genre! Walk around and explore the village to meet the main guy, Winston. Winston will give you exciting quests to complete and be rewarded by! Find different items through the
game to use on many different things. Gameplay is made simple so you will be able to pick it up in a few minutes of playing! Game lenght depends on the player but estimated to be around 30 minutes. The game does not include a saving system,
so be ready to play in one sitting!
